title: Limitless: Encore
description: “I’m not sure what’s holding me back” Life with Jace is more fulfilling than I ever dreamed possible. My gorgeous Viking drummer is perfect in every way. I’d love to give him the most precious gift. If I could only get my mind—and body—to cooperate. Will my change of heart cost us everything? “She’s always been worth the wait.” Alex is a strong-willed badass with a heart of gold. My heart’s been in the palm of her hand since I met her. I’d move mountains to take away her suffering. To prove to her our love is enough. Then tragedy strikes, and I may never get another chance. Happily ever after can mean so many things. Life happens. Faith is tested. Will Jace & Alex recover from a most devastating loss? Is true love really LIMITLESS? ENCORE is Book 6 in the Less Than Zero Rockstar Romance Series, and is the sequel to LIMITLESS.
author: Kaylene Winter
